titles: The blame of kirk-buriall, tending to persvvade cemiteriall ciuilitie First preached, then penned, and now at last propyned to the Lords inheritance in the Presbyterie of Lanerk, by M. William Birnie the Lord his minister in that ilk, as a pledge of his zeale, and care of that reformation.
author: Birnie, William, 1563-1619.
publisher: Printed by Robert Charteris printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the University of Edinburgh. Library.
keywords: Funeral rites and ceremonies --  Early works to 1800.
